scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:github && npm run build:ssr && npm run prerender && npm run ssg
scripts.build:with-data: npm run fetch-data && npm run build:static
scripts.build:seo: npm run generate:sitemap && npm run build
scripts.build:github: npm run fetch-data && npm run generate:sitemap && npm run validate-data && vite build && node scripts/inject-build-version.js
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try { fs.rmSync('node_modules', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.rmSync('package-lock.json', { force: true }); console.log('Removed node_modules and package-lock.json. Run npm install to reinstall dependencies.'); } catch (e) { console.log('Failed to remove some files:', e.message); }"
scripts.seo:build: npm run generate:sitemap && npm run build
scripts.seo:validate: echo 'SEO validation tools would run here - check lighthouse, structured data testing, etc.'
scripts.deploy:check: npm run check && npm run validate-data && npm run build:github && npm run preview:github
scripts.analyze: vite build --mode production && npx rollup-plugin-visualizer --json stats.json --template treemap --sourcemap false || true
